meanings.sent1: She disproportionated the sizes of the cakes for the party.
meanings.sent2: The artist disproportionated the features of the portrait for a unique effect.
meanings.sent3: The chef disproportionated the ingredients in the recipe, creating a surprisingly delicious dish.
meanings.sent4: His sudden outburst disproportionated the calm atmosphere of the room.
meanings.sent5: The storm disproportionated the landscape, leaving a path of destruction in its wake.

meanings.definition: To cause to be out of proportion.
meanings.sent1: The heavy rain disproportinated the weight of the tree, causing it to fall.
meanings.sent2: The incorrect measurements disproportinated the entire building project.
meanings.sent3: The magician disproportinated the lengths of the scarves in his trick, confusing the audience.
meanings.sent4: Her laughter disproportinated the seriousness of the meeting.
meanings.sent5: The faulty gear disproportinated the speed of the machine, leading to a breakdown.

meanings.sent1: The disproportinated sizes of the shoes made it hard to find a pair that fit.
meanings.sent2: The disproportinated shapes of the clouds created a beautiful sunset.
meanings.sent3: The disproportinated colors of the painting gave it a unique and quirky charm.
meanings.sent4: His disproportinated reaction to the news surprised everyone.
meanings.sent5: The disproportinated distribution of resources led to an imbalance in the community.
